nocubes.command.changeSmoothableNoPermis: Unable to change block smoothness; no permission
nocubes.notification.infoMessage:
NoCubes is installed, press %1$s while looking at a block to change if it is smooth
You can disable this message by changing '%2$s' to 'false' in your client config (%3$s)
nocubes.notification.notInstalledOnServe:
You have connected to a server that does not have NoCubes installed
You can still play but NoCubes' custom collisions cannot work properly and have been temporarily disabled
Any changes to smooth blocks you make by pressing %1$s while looking at a block will not be saved
nocubes.notification.visualsForcedByServ: This server forces NoCubes' visuals to be enabled at all times while playing to ensure a 'proper' player experience
nocubes.notification.visualsDisabled: You have turned off NoCubes' visuals, press '%1$s' to turn them on again or set '%2$s' to 'true' in your client config (%3$s)
